Your Complimentary Ticket to Top Virtual AI Event on 27 JUNE Thu. Hello I'm excited to share some complimentary guest tickets (worth US$300 each) for a highly relevant virtual AI event: How to Get Buy-In from Your HODs for Your Organizational AI Guidelines. This masterclass tackles a critical challenge for organizations looking to implement AI. Join us on June 27th! However, despite the high interest in AI, there's often a lack of buy-in and championing from leadership, including founders, CEOs, and C-levels. This event aims to bridge that gap. Misconception 1: "AI is IT" AI is actually the most user-friendly technological revolution, with benefits for everyone from young professionals to senior management. No prior IT skills are required! Misconception 2: "AI is Expensive and Time-Consuming" AI University's bestselling masterclass, "How to Get Buy-In for AI Guidelines," shows how to leverage ChatGPT and Generative AI in just 1-2 hours. Misconception 3: "Senior Managers Resist Generative AI" Our proven track record demonstrates that hands-on experience with ChatGPT and other AI tools quickly converts skeptics into believers. Don't miss out! Date: June 27th (Thu), 2024 Time: 2:00 PM - 6:00 PM Hong Kong-Singapore Time (See your local time zone) Platform: Zoom Virtual Limited Seats Available (1 Free Guest per Organization) Are you available to attend? If not, please consider sending a replacement, ideally an HR or L&D decision-maker. Attending this event grants you automatic eligibility to join the World's Elite AI Network. Register today! https://lnkd.in/gPDnVx6E â€¢ Learn more about the Masterclass Outline + Testimonials: https://lnkd.in/gecascsc ~ On behalf of: Robren, Founder, AI University and International AI Association #AI. #chatgpt. #Gemini. #ainetwork. #misconceptions. #masterclass. #it. #headofdepartment. #CLevels

The buzz in the tech sector about generative AI has many companies pondering: Should we pivot our positioning and messaging to ride this wave? As someone deeply invested in the intersection of technology and strategy, I want to share some thoughts that might help guide this decision. ğŸ¤– Gen AI: trend or transformation? Generative AI isn't just a fleeting trend; it's a transformative technology reshaping how we think about data, creativity, and automation. But here's the catch: while it's tempting to jump on the bandwagon, it's crucial to approach this with a strategic mindset. ğŸ¯ Integrating AI into your value proposition AI is an enabling technology, not a market in itself. The key question is: How can generative AI enhance your existing products or services? The goal is to integrate AI into your offerings in a way that amplifies their value and aligns with what your customers truly care about. ğŸ’¡ Avoiding the hype trap It's easy to get caught up in the hype and force a trend onto a product that doesnâ€™t naturally fit. This can lead to confusion and dilute your core messaging. Instead, focus on how AI can genuinely improve your product's functionality or user experience. ğŸŒ Practical steps for tech companies: âœ… Evaluate the fit: Assess how generative AI aligns with your current offerings. Does it enhance your productâ€™s core capabilities? âœ… Understand your audience: Will your customers benefit from AI integration? It's not just about what's technologically possible, but what's practically beneficial. âœ… Update messaging thoughtfully: If AI adds real value, update your messaging to reflect this. Highlight the benefits, not just the technology. ğŸ” In conclusion: Generative AI offers exciting possibilities, but it's essential to stay true to your brand's core value and market position. Let's not just follow a trend for the sake of it; let's make sure it makes sense for our products, our customers, and our market. I'm curious to hear your thoughts. How are you approaching the generative AI trend in your business strategy? #AI #TechTrends #BusinessStrategy #ProductPositioning #Innovation #chatgpt #growthmarketing

ğŸš¨ ğ‹ğğšğğğ«ğ¬ ğ°ğšğ­ğœğ¡-ğ¨ğ®ğ­! ğ–ğ¡ğ² ğ›ğ«ğ¢ğ§ğ ğ¢ğ§ğ  #ğ€ğˆ ğ­ğ¨ ğ²ğ¨ğ®ğ« ğ¨ğ«ğ ğšğ§ğ¢ğ³ğšğ­ğ¢ğ¨ğ§ ğ¦ğ¢ğ ğ¡ğ­ ğğ«ğ¢ğ¯ğ ğ¦ğ¨ğ«ğ ğœğ¡ğšğ§ğ ğ ğ­ğ¡ğšğ§ ğ²ğ¨ğ® ğšğ§ğ­ğ¢ğœğ¢ğ©ğšğ­ğğ ğ¢ğ§ ğ­ğ¡ğ 1ğ¬ğ­ ğ©ğ¥ğšğœğ ğŸ‘‡ OK - we all agree that generative AI should be on every corporateâ€™s agenda Most discussions today are still around tools like ChatGPT and fancy use cases ğŸ¤‘ One central aspect is too often not in focus: Human behavior and existing ways of working in your organization ğŸ‘©ğŸ’» Because letâ€™s be honest here: A) Will you take time to make your organization future proof and #AI ready? OR B) Will you fix it on the fly and bring in a Tier 1 consultancy to drive the transformation? Iâ€™m not gonna answer this ğŸ˜‚ but instead will directly jump into Boston Consulting Group (BCG) Generative AI study together with Harvard Business School My Top 5: 1ï¸âƒ£ When generative AI is used in creative ideation, 90% of participants increased performance 2ï¸âƒ£ When working on business problem solving, performance decreased by 23% when generative AI is used 3ï¸âƒ£ Even participants who were warned about the possibility of wrong answers from the tool did not challenge its output 4ï¸âƒ£ Uniform output from AI reduces groupâ€™s diversity by 41% 5ï¸âƒ£ Think critically about which tasks can benefit from or be damaged by generative AI âš ï¸ We need to find a rewarding way to keep thinking out of the box a significant value for the future. High performance matters! Any thoughts how we can make it happen ğŸ’­ Tim JÃ¤ger Nico Breidenbach VJ Bala Raquel Torres GonzÃ¡lez Chandana Fitzgerald Gloria Seibert PD Dr. med Benjamin Friedrich #AI #innovation https://lnkd.in/es29wuqe

If the end goal is to find the perfect AI tool, then you are missing the poinğŸš« It is about creating workflows that allow AI to become your ultimate creative collaborator. Here is my 5-Step Framework to Achieve Strategic AI Integration 1. Audit Your Creative Process: - Review your current creative workflows and identify the tasks that can benefit from AI integration. - Determine areas where automation could save time and repetitive work. 2. Select Relevant AI Tools: - Research and test a range of AI tools designed for creative work. - Prioritize tools that align with your specific needs and can seamlessly integrate into your current processes. 3. Build Custom AI Workflows: - Design a tailored AI workflow that complements your team's strengths and automates routine tasks. - Start with smaller tasks to familiarize the team with the technology, gradually expanding to more complex projects. 4. Foster a Culture of Experimentation: - Encourage team members to experiment with new tools and share their findings. - Set up collaborative sessions to explore innovative ways to blend human creativity with AI-generated insights. 5. Monitor and Refine: - Regularly assess the performance and impact of AI in your creative process. - Collect feedback from stakeholders and team members to improve workflows, ensuring the integration remains aligned with your goals. This should help you get a strang foundation and help you scale your creative process and improve overall ROIğŸš€ How are you integrating AI to enhance your creativity and lead innovation in your industry? -- Enjoy this? â™»ï¸ Repost it to your network and follow Sachin Kamathâ†—ï¸for more. Want latest AI trends and updates along with proven systems for creatives? Join our community of 5,000+ subscribers today: https://lnkd.in/dvPzKBXX #ai #generativeai #leonardoai #chatgpt #midjourney #aimusic #aianimation #canva

ğŸš€ AI Workshops at CES 2024 As we approach the wind down to the year, we're thrilled to share a fantastic opportunity awaiting you in the new year. Join us at CES in Las Vegas this January for exclusive AI workshops, tailored for brands eager to integrate AI into their marketing strategies. Here's a sneak peek into what we have lined up: - AI Planning Session: - Educational Workshops: - Private ChatGPT Setup & Training: These workshops are not just about learning; they're about applying AI in practical, impactful ways. And yes, spots are limited! If you're planning to be at CES and want to transform how your business leverages AI, this is your chance. Reach out to us to book your spot, and let's make 2023 an incredible year of AI-driven growth together. ğŸŒŸ See you in Vegas! #ces2024 #ai #advertising

ğŸ‘‰ğŸ» Feel youâ€™re getting left behind on all things AI? ğŸ‘‰ğŸ» Are your teams overwhelmed by it? ğŸ‘‰ğŸ» Does your organisation want to use it but youâ€™re unsure where to start? ğŸ‘‰ğŸ» Do you have AI guilt as it feels like everyone is using it other than you? *We got you!* â¤ï¸ Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming our world as we know it and there is no doubt it will become an integral part of our professional lives. Forward-thinking organisations are embracing the benefits AI brings to their people and performance and enabling their teams to use it confidently. Weâ€™re helping them do this by simplifying the complexity around Generative AI. Following the success of our â€˜AI for the Average Joeâ€™ podcast series, our new, engaging and interactive programme provides practical training to help organisations get started â€“ by enabling an understanding of digital ethics, supporting managers to coach the required behaviours, and providing the experience for teams to build the underpinning skills. Our upcoming virtual event â€œHow to use Gen AI in the workplaceâ€ presents innovative techniques, interactive training and expert knowledge to help you work confidently with Generative AI. Using the Quantum Rise engagement methodology and enabling you to use AI live online, we explore how you can use AI to reduce time, improve outcomes and be more productive. By the end of the event, you will: â€¢ Understand what Generative AI is and how you can use it to engage with your clients, team and organisation. â€¢ Know practical prompts to get the best out of AI apps, saving you time and effort. â€¢ Recognise the wider opportunities available by using Generative AI â€¢ Have an insight into our new, interactive programme that provides the knowledge you need to embed Generative AI in your workplace. â€¢ And you will use ChatGPT and Gamma AI live in the session as well as taking away the recording. Our interactive virtual event takes place on Tuesday, 5th December 10:30-12:00 GMT UK â€“ places are limited. â­ï¸ Book on Eventbrite here ğŸ‘‰ğŸ» https://lnkd.in/eEmCrvY7 #ai #artificalintelligence #learninganddevelopment #workplaceskills #genai #futureskills
